description_en: The annotated data matrix for input, .h5ad-formatted hdf5 file
description_zh: 输入的 annotated 矩阵文件， .h5ad后缀的hdf5 格式

description_en: The effective scale of embedded points. In combination with min_dist this determines how clustered/clumped the embedded points are
description_zh: 嵌入点的有效尺度.与min_dist结合使用可确定聚类点的聚集程度/聚集方式.

description_en: The number of negative edge/1-simplex samples to use per positive edge/1-simplex sample in optimizing the low dimensional embedding
description_zh: 在优化低维聚类时,每个正边/1-单纯形样本使用的负边/1-单纯形样本数

description_en: The number of dimensions of the embedding

The effective minimum distance between embedded points. Smaller values will result in a more clustered/clumped embedding where nearby points on the manifold are drawn closer together, while larger values will result on a more even dispersal of points. The value should be set relative to the spread value, which determines the scale at which embedded points will be spread out.
description_zh: 嵌入点之间的最小有效距离.较小的值将导致更多的聚集/聚集嵌入,其中流形上的相邻点绘制得更近,而较大的值将导致点的分布更加均匀.该值应相对于排列值进行设置,该值决定嵌入点将展开的比例.

description_en: Number of memory running tasksnotice:1. The value range is 0.25-32 cores, in addition, 48 cores and 64 cores can be selected, and the CPU must be an integer multiple of 0.25 cores; 2. The memory value range is 1GB-512GB, and the memory must be an integer multiple of 1GB. 3. The CPU / memory ratio must be between 1:2 and 1:8
description_zh: 任务运行的内存数量,注意1.取值范围为0.25核-32核,另外还可选48核和64,CPU必须为0.25核的整数倍;2.内存取值范围>为1GB-512GB,且内存必须为1GB的整数倍3.CPU/内存配比值必须在1:2到1:8之间

description_en: How to initialize the low dimensional embedding,['paga', 'spectral', 'random], ndarray, None] (default: 'spectral')
description_zh: 如何初始化低维聚类,可选值['paga', 'spectral', 'random'], ndarray, None] (默认值: 'spectral')

description_en: Weighting applied to negative samples in low dimensional embedding optimization. Values higher than one will result in greater weight being given to negative samples.
description_zh: 低维嵌入优化中负样本的加权.大于1的值将导致负数样本的权重更大.

description_en: Number of CPU running tasks.notice:1. The value range is 0.25-32 cores, in addition, 48 cores and 64 cores can be selected, and the CPU must be an integer multiple of 0.25 cores; 2. The memory value range is 1GB-512GB, and the memory must be an integer multiple of 1GB. 3. The CPU / memory ratio must be between 1:2 and 1:8
description_zh: 任务运行的CPU数量,注意1.取值范围为0.25核-32核,另外还可选48核和64,CPU必须为0.25核的整数倍;2.内存取值范围为1GB-512GB,且内存必须为1GB的整数倍3.CPU/内存配比值必须在1:2到1:8之间

description_en: The initial learning rate for the embedding optimization
description_zh: 嵌入优化的初始学习速率.
